languages.text: {n}Грациозный танец мехадендритов обретает более энергичный, буйный рисунок.{/n} "Я склоняюсь к мысли, что Эсхатос необходим. Амарнат необходим. Цикл должен быть прерван".

{n}The graceful dance of the mechadendrites takes on a more energetic, wilder pattern.{/n} "I am leaning toward the idea that Eschatos is necessary. That Amarnat is necessary. That the Cycle must be discontinued."
languages.original_text: {n}Грациозный танец мехадендритов обретает более энергичный, буйный рисунок.{/n} "Я склоняюсь к мысли, что Эсхатос необходим. Амарнат необходим. Цикл должен быть прерван".

traits.locale_text: {n}The graceful dance of the mechadendrites takes on a more energetic and fierce pattern.{/n} "I am leaning toward the idea that Eschatos is necessary. That Amarnat is necessary. That the Cycle must be discontinued."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}機械触手の優雅な踊りはさらに力強く、荒々しい動きとなる。{/n}「エスカトは必要だと考えつつある。そしてアマルナトも必要だ。サイクルを断ち切らなくてはならない」
languages.original_text: {n}The graceful dance of the mechadendrites takes on a more energetic, wilder pattern.{/n} "I am leaning toward the idea that Eschatos is necessary. That Amarnat is necessary. That the Cycle must be discontinued."

traits.locale_text: {n}機械触手の優雅な踊りはさらに力強く、荒々しい動きとなる。{/n}「エスカトは必要だと考えつつある。そしてアマルナトも必要だ。サイクルを断ち切らなくてはならない」
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}机械触须的优雅舞蹈变得更有活力、更加狂野。{/n}“我倾向认为，终焉审判是必要的，阿玛纳特也是必要的。循环必须终止。”
languages.original_text: {n}The graceful dance of the mechadendrites takes on a more energetic, wilder pattern.{/n} "I am leaning toward the idea that Eschatos is necessary. That Amarnat is necessary. That the Cycle must be discontinued."

traits.locale_text: {n}机械触须的优雅舞蹈变得更有活力、更加狂野。{/n}“我倾向认为，终焉审判是必要的，阿玛纳特也是必要的。循环必须终止。”
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}La danse jusque-là gracieuse des mécadendrites se fait plus énergique et primitive.{/n} « Je pense qu'Eschatos est nécessaire. Qu'Amarnat est nécessaire. Que le Cycle doit être interrompu. »
languages.original_text: {n}The graceful dance of the mechadendrites takes on a more energetic, wilder pattern.{/n} "I am leaning toward the idea that Eschatos is necessary. That Amarnat is necessary. That the Cycle must be discontinued."

traits.locale_text: {n}La danse jusque-là gracieuse des mécadendrites se fait plus énergique et primitive.{/n} « Je pense qu'Eschatos est nécessaire. Qu'Amarnat est nécessaire. Que le Cycle doit être interrompu. »
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}La elegante danza de sus mecadendritas realiza un patrón aún más enérgico y salvaje.{/n} «Me inclino hacia la idea de que Eschatos es necesario, al igual que Amarnat, y de que el Ciclo debe interrumpirse».
languages.original_text: {n}The graceful dance of the mechadendrites takes on a more energetic, wilder pattern.{/n} "I am leaning toward the idea that Eschatos is necessary. That Amarnat is necessary. That the Cycle must be discontinued."

traits.locale_text: {n}La elegante danza de sus mecadendritas realiza un patrón aún más enérgico y salvaje.{/n} «Me inclino hacia la idea de que Eschatos es necesario, al igual que Amarnat, y de que el Ciclo debe interrumpirse».
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Der elegante Tanz der Mechadendriten nimmt ein energischeres, wilderes Muster an.{/n} "Ich tendiere zu dem Gedanken, dass Eschatos notwendig ist. Dass Amarnat notwendig ist. Dass der Zyklus durchbrochen werden muss."
languages.original_text: {n}The graceful dance of the mechadendrites takes on a more energetic, wilder pattern.{/n} "I am leaning toward the idea that Eschatos is necessary. That Amarnat is necessary. That the Cycle must be discontinued."

traits.locale_text: {n}Der elegante Tanz der Mechadendriten nimmt ein energischeres, wilderes Muster an.{/n} "Ich tendiere zu dem Gedanken, dass Eschatos notwendig ist. Dass Amarnat notwendig ist. Dass der Zyklus durchbrochen werden muss."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Mekadentritlerin zarif dansı, daha enerjik ve vahşi bir motife dönüşüyor.{/n} "Eskatos'un gerekli olduğu fikrine meylediyorum. Amarnat'ın gerekli olduğu fikrine. Döngü süreğinin bozulumunun gerektiği fikrine."
languages.original_text: {n}The graceful dance of the mechadendrites takes on a more energetic, wilder pattern.{/n} "I am leaning toward the idea that Eschatos is necessary. That Amarnat is necessary. That the Cycle must be discontinued."

traits.locale_text: {n}Mekadentritlerin zarif dansı, daha enerjik ve vahşi bir motife dönüşüyor:{/n} "Eschatos'un gerekli olduğu fikrine meylediyorum. Amarnat'ın gerekli olduğu fikrine. Döngü'nün süreğinin bozulması gerektiği fikrine."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion
